subject: Re: [junit] What is a better way of feeding test data to a test case
msgSnippet: ... Using FIT/FitNesse for such test cases is even easier. www.fitnesse.org -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar Software Services http://www.diasparsoftware.com ::
messageBody:
Ramanand Hegde wrote:

> Hi Mithun,
>
> The general assumption is that modifying an XML
> to change the test case parameters is easier than
> changing the Java code. You can easily transform
> a generic test case to

Using FIT/FitNesse for such test cases is even easier. www.fitnesse.org
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
